mapper.update: update roms set numb = #{numb,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, person_liable_id = #{personLiableId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, numb, `type`, person_liable_id, content, `state` from roms
